scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src='src/data'; const dst='dist/data'; if(!fs.existsSync(dst))fs.mkdirSync(dst, {recursive:true}); function copy(s,d){const stat=fs.statSync(s);if(stat.isDirectory()){if(!fs.existsSync(d))fs.mkdirSync(d);fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>copy(path.join(s,f),path.join(d,f)));}else fs.copyFileSync(s,d);}copy(src,dst);"
